title: Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
job_overview:
Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
We need a proactive performance marketer to plan and execute paid campaigns that drive measurable results. You'll help unlock growth through data-led experimentation.

Requirements:

Strong foundation in Facebook/Google advertising

Familiar with CPL, CPA, and campaign budget scaling

Strong analytical and reporting skills

Please send your CV to: Upgrade to see actual info
We do not respond to messages via onlinejobs.
